Class CSVOfficerRegistrationRepository

java.lang.Object
com.SC2002.bto.repository.csv.CSVOfficerRegistrationRepository
All Implemented Interfaces:
IOfficerRegistrationRepository
public class CSVOfficerRegistrationRepository extends Object implements IOfficerRegistrationRepository
CSV-based implementation of the officer registration repository. Follows the Single Responsibility Principle by focusing only on officer registration data access.
